columns.EmployeeID: The unique identifier for each employee.
columns.Name: The full name of the employee.
columns.Position: The job title or role of the employee.
columns.Salary: The compensation amount for the employee's position.
columns.Remarks: The additional comments or notes about the employee.

Employee.table_description: The table stores essential information about employees.

columns.PlanetID: The unique identifier for each planet.
columns.Name: The designated name of the planet.
columns.Coordinates: The spatial location of the planet in real numbers.

Planet.table_description: The table stores detailed information about different planets.

columns.ShipmentID: The unique identifier for each shipment.
columns.Date: The scheduled date for the shipment.
columns.Manager: The identifier for the employee managing the shipment.
columns.Planet: The identifier for the planet associated with the shipment.

Shipment.table_description: The table tracks shipments along with relevant management and planetary details.

columns.Employee: The unique identifier for each employee with clearance.
columns.Planet: The unique identifier for each planet related to clearance.
columns.Level: The clearance level assigned to the employee for the planet.

Has_Clearance.table_description: The table associates employees with their clearance levels for specific planets.

columns.AccountNumber: The unique identifier for each client account.
columns.Name: The full name of the client associated with the account.

Client.table_description: The table stores essential details about client accounts.

columns.Shipment: The unique identifier for each shipment to which the package is associated.
columns.PackageNumber: The unique identifier for each specific package within a shipment.
columns.Contents: The description of items contained within the package.
columns.Weight: The total weight of the package measured in real numbers.
columns.Sender: The unique identifier of the client sending the package.
columns.Recipient: The unique identifier of the client receiving the package.

Package.table_description: The table manages information related to packages within shipments.
